name: Maximized Spellstrike

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Maximized magic magus arcana, weapon expertise class feature or Quick Draw.

sections.body: When you make a melee attack and successfully use your spellstrike ability against an opponent denied his Dexterity bonus to AC, you can spend 3 points from your arcane pool to maximize the spell delivered through your spellstrike as if using the Maximize Spell metamagic feat.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You deal brutal damage against opponents caught unawares.
